version_description:
Fixed pause while boosting crash when graphics settings are set to low/medium.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

Fixed pause while boosting crash when graphics settings are set to low/medium.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.

- Improved multiplayer matchmaking
- Fixed some graphics issues when running on Metal with 'Ultra' settings
- Fixed pause button responsiveness on iOS10

- Improved multiplayer matchmaking
- Fixed some graphics issues when running on Metal with 'Ultra' settings
- Fixed pause button responsiveness on iOS10

- New "Gemini" hydrojet!
- Added full screen support for iPhone X
- Minor bug fixes

- New "Gemini" hydrojet!
- Added full screen support for iPhone X
- Minor bug fixes

- Updates to privacy and social links
- SDK updates, bug fixes

- Updates to privacy and social links
- SDK updates, bug fixes

- Fixed missing brake buttons in touch screen controls.
- Made "Spymaster" achievement easier to attain.
- Minor stability fixes.
